document.full_text: a high-level pentagon review of the lockheed martin corp  f-35 fighter program has been postponed from this week until june 14, three sources familiar with the scheduled meeting said on friday.
document.title: pentagon f-35 review postponed until mid-june
lines_and_colors: a high-level pentagon review of the lockheed martin corp  f-35 fighter program has been postponed from this week until june 14, three sources familiar with the scheduled meeting said on friday.
